content.text:
Mr. FRANKEN. Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that my energy 
policy fellow, Shuchi Talati, be granted floor privileges for the 
remainder of this Congress.
content.speaker: Mr. FRANKEN

content.text: The PRESIDING OFFICER. Without objection, it is so ordered.
content.speaker: The PRESIDING OFFICER

content.text:
Mr. MERKLEY. Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that my intern 
Zach Foote be granted privileges of the floor for the remainder of the 
day.
content.speaker: Mr. MERKLEY

content.text: The PRESIDING OFFICER. Without objection, it is so ordered.
content.speaker: The PRESIDING OFFICER

content.text:
Mr. GARDNER. Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Tom Kourlis, 
a member of my staff, be given floor privileges for the rest of the 
day.
content.speaker: Mr. GARDNER

content.text: The PRESIDING OFFICER. Without objection, it is so ordered.
content.speaker: The PRESIDING OFFICER
